Notes.Text:
This update for gimp fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-48797: Fixed two buffer over-reads and one heap-based buffer overflow in its TGA parser (bsc#1243711).
- CVE-2025-48798: Fixed two use-after-free bugs and one double free bug in its XCF parser (bsc#1243712).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw was found in GIMP when processing certain TGA image files. If a user opens one of these image files that has been specially crafted by an attacker, GIMP can be tricked into making serious memory errors, potentially leading to crashes and causing a heap buffer overflow.

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw was found in GIMP when processing XCF image files. If a user opens one of these image files that has been specially crafted by an attacker, GIMP can be tricked into making serious memory errors, potentially leading to crashes and causing use-after-free issues.
